Robot Friends

A React app that generates cards of robots using randomly generated information from an API

Created using: HTML, CSS, JavaScript, Node.js, React.js and JSON


A responsive React js website that shows cards containing information of various robots. The user can also search for a specific robot. App was created using React js, HTML and CSS. The images of robots are fetched from a website called RoboHash. Robot information was fetched using this link â€‹
